email_body:
Dear Jennifer,

We have recently detected some suspicious activity on your SafeSecurity account. In order to ensure the security of your data and maintain the integrity of our systems, we kindly request your immediate attention.

As a DevOps engineer and a trusted member of our organization, your expertise is crucial in addressing this matter effectively. We believe your collaboration will help us in identifying and mitigating any potential security risks.

For your convenience, we have prepared a detailed report on the recent security incident. Please click here to access the report.

Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to our dedicated IT support team.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

Jonathan Bennett
SafeSecurity IT Department
